Text:
#line{}Combat Control
#line{}#action{Up} #action{Left} #action{Down} #action{Right} - Move
#action{Action1} #action{Action2} #action{Action3} #action{Action4} - Use ship components
#action{QuickUse1} #action{QuickUse2} #action{QuickUse3} #action{QuickUse4} - Use inventory items
#action{Use} - Interact with object under cursor
#action{SwapUp} - Switch ships
#action{CallHelp} - Issue fleet command
#image{mousescroll}#color{255,255,0}Mouse wheel or Page Up/Page Down#dcolor{} - to zoom in\out
#action{lock} - lock ship rotation in rotating ships
#line{}Menus
#line{}#action{MissionLog} - Open mission log
#action{Inventory} - Open inventory and crafting interface
#action{Hangar} - Open fleet management interface
#action{TacticalMap} - Open tactical map
#action{GalaxyMap} - Open galaxy map
